mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_menu_authinfo MA LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_menu_info MI ON MA.MENU_ID = MI.MENU_ID AND MI.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE MA.AUTH_CD = ( SELECT AUTH_TASK FROM tb_user_info WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} LIMIT 1 ) AND MI.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl} AND MA.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_info ( EMAIL , NICKNAME , USER_KEY , GRADE , POINT , USED_POINT , THWD , SVC_AGREE_YN , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , AUTH_TASK , AUTH_MENU , CR_DT , UP_DT ) VALUES ( #{email} , #{nickname} , #{userKey} , 'N' , 0 , 0 , #{thwd} , 'N' , 0 , 'normal' , 'normal' , DATE(NOW()) , DATE(NOW()) )
